pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12174 WebAuthn: create authenticator, requiredAction and pol…

timeline.bodyText: It seems that no one calls this method getCredentialProvider. Could you confirm it? If so, IMO, it might be better to delete this method.
timeline.author: tnorimat

replies.bodyText:
Thanks, the only reason why I kept this method was, that I originally worked on this on top of the other branch for introduce "Try another way" link. That task changed some stuff in WebAuthnAuthenticator class (added CredentialValidator as an implementing interface among other things).
Now that other PR is merged in Keycloak master, which means that the method "getCredentialProvider" became to be used :) I needed to do few more very small changes in the WebAuthnAuthenticator and WebAuthnPasswordlessAuthenticator class. Do you have a chance to re-review?
replies.author: mposolda
